sentences.english: This pond looks much smaller than the Yellow Dragon Pond.
sentences.chinese: 這個潭好像比黃龍潭小了不少啊。

sentences.english: This pond looks much smaller than the Yellow Dragon Pond.
sentences.chinese: 這個潭好像比黃龍潭小了不少啊。

sentences.english: Thus three ponds of different sizes appeared as the home of the Yellow Dragon's family.
sentences.chinese: 剷出了三個大小不等的潭作爲黃龍一家的棲息地。

sentences.english: Around the pool, there are green willows approaching ground, green cedar rising to sky, clean water and countable swimming fishes.
sentences.chinese: 潭周綠柳垂地，翠柏指天，泉水清澈，游魚可數。

sentences.english: Not only the waterfalls and ponds here.
That pale beige color of the case is natural and won't tan no matter how long it sits in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 米色，蒼白色此案潭自然不會坐着不管太陽多久。

sentences.english: It was a deep pool under a high canopy of leaves.
sentences.chinese: 那個潭很深，在它的高處是一大片樹林。

sentences.english: Thus, it is of realistic necessity to enable legislation in Changsha-Zhuzhou-Xiangtan comprehensive reform experimental district.
sentences.chinese: 故授權立法是長株潭綜合配套改革試驗區的現實需要。

sentences.english: You can see the sea-bed and there are tiny rock-pools everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 你能見到海底到處都有小小的岩石潭。

sentences.english: The tide was out and they walked among the rock pools.
sentences.chinese: 潮水已經退去，他們走過岩石區的潮水潭。

sentences.english: So locals call this place the Guanyin Pond.
sentences.chinese: 所以當地人就把這裏叫觀音潭。

sentences.english: The couple moved out and Mr. Tan moved in. Mr.
sentences.chinese: 那對男女搬出去之後又住進來一位潭先生。

sentences.english: Signatures on the board at Seven Star Lake Giant rental bike shop.
sentences.chinese: 在捷安特七星潭租賃站留下簽名。

sentences.english: But Mr. Hong continued to produce politically oriented work.
sentences.chinese: 但是洪成潭繼續創作有政治導向的作品。

sentences.english: The radiation sensor relies on a crystalline material, CZT.
sentences.chinese: 輻射傳感器依賴於晶體材料，長株潭。
